summary: A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.
cast: Jane Fonda|Donald Sutherland|Charles Cioffi|Roy Scheider|Dorothy Tristan|Rita Gam|Nathan George|Vivian Nathan|Morris Strassberg|Barry Snider|Betty Murray|Jane White|Shirley Stoler|Robert Milli|Anthony Holland|Fred Burrell|Richard B. Shull|Mary Louise Wilson|Marc Malvin|Rosalind Cash|Jean Stapleton|Jan Fielding|Antonia Rey|Robert Ronan|Richard Russell Ramos|Jerome Collamore|Candy Darling|Kevin Dobson|Veronica Hamel|Richard Jordan|Margaret Linn|Tony Major|Harry Reems|Joe Silver|Ellen Stretton|Lee Wallace
title: Klute
